'Federal Kọleji nke Mmụta, Obudu' bụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị etiti agụmakwụkwọ ka elu dị na Obudu, Cross River Steeti, Naijiria
O jikọtara ya na Mahadum nke Calabar maka mmemme nzere ya
Onye na-eme Onye isi ugbu a bụ Malam Ladan Chado.
E hiwere Federal Kọleji nke Mmụta, Obudu na 1983.
Ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ ahụ na-enye nkuzi ndị a;
Ụlọ ọrụ a nwere mmekọ na Mahadum nke Calabar inye mmemme na-eduga na Bachelor nke Mmụta, (B.Ed.) na;
